description: Web Based Adult DVD Subscription Service
overview:
Porn DVR is an internet-based adult subscription service. Similar to Netflix and it’s instant queue, Porn DVR offers a large number of of pre-recorded movies and adult titles available to stream in real-time or “download to own”.

The site model is straight forward; free video clips with an optional monthly fee for a “Premium Membership”. The upgraded membership allows subscribers to stream videos in higher quality, download entire movies, rate scenes, favorite movies and view matching photos. User also have the ability to download DVD content entirely along with box covers and artwork for non-commercial, personal use.

The site incorporates use of a proprietary video conversion system that allows subscribers to convert video formats “on-the-fly”. The system will convert and encode videos into .vob, .3gp, .mov, MP4 and Ipod formats in real-time for download.

Porn DVR is a privately funded investment by members of the adult industry including performers, artists and production studios. As of December 2009, the site exceeded 5,000 full movie titles and 17,500 Movie Clips.
